name: Dont Die (The Fat Punisher)
description:
A quirky random generation survival game where you must fight against your mortality, and make numerous morally questionable decisions along the way...

Features:
  • Randomly generated world
  • Build anywhere you want
  • Craft Items and perform rituals
  • Defeat Foes and earn trophies
  • No classes or playstyle restrictions
  • Be an organ harvesting necromancer or settle down and start a family

*Active Development* Leave a comment below for feature suggestions and bug reports~

Created by TFP

Powered by the 001 Game Creator engine.
